text: Maoye International Holdings Limited (), or Maoye International, Maoye, is the top-rank leading department store in Shenzhen, Guangdong, China and is engaged in department store and retailing business in Guangdong, Sichuan, Chongqing and Jiangsu.Profile of Maoye International Holding Limited Maoye postponed in the Hong Kong Stock Exchange for two times in 2000 and January 2008 respectively due to poor stock market conditions at that time,Latest IPO victim Maoye shelves debut until it was successfully listed on 5 May 2008. At the first trading day, its stock price closed at HK$3.04, 2% lower compared with its IPO price, HK$3.1.Maoye falls 2 pct in disappointing HK IPO debut ==References== Category:Companies listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange Category:Retail companies established in 1996 Category:Department stores of China Category:Companies based in Shenzhen Category:Privately held companies of China
title: Maoye International
